Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 393.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3101 West Sunflower Avenue in Santa Ana, California, as the "Hector G. Godinez Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 3101 West Sunflower Avenue in Santa Ana, California, as the Hector G. Godinez Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3101 West Sunflower Avenue in Santa Ana, California, as the "Hector G. Godinez Post Office Building".
